io.lettuce.core

接口 RedisConnectionStateListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    RedisConnectionStateAdapter

    public interface RedisConnectionStateListener
    Simple interface for Redis connection state monitoring.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection)
      已过时。 
      since 4.4, use onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler, SocketAddress).
      default void onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection, SocketAddress socketAddress)
      Event handler for successful connection event.
      void onRedisDisconnected(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection)
      Event handler for disconnection event.
      void onRedisExceptionCaught(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection, Throwable cause)
      Event handler for exceptions.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onRedisConnected

        @Deprecated
default void onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection)
        已过时。 since 4.4, use onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler, SocketAddress).
        Event handler for successful connection event.
        参数:
        connection - Source connection.

      • onRedisConnected

        default void onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection,
                              SocketAddress socketAddress)
        Event handler for successful connection event. Delegates by default to onRedisConnected(RedisChannelHandler).
        参数:
        connection - Source connection.
        socketAddress - remote SocketAddress.
        从以下版本开始:
        4.4

      • onRedisDisconnected

        void onRedisDisconnected(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection)
        Event handler for disconnection event.
        参数:
        connection - Source connection.

      • onRedisExceptionCaught

        void onRedisExceptionCaught(RedisChannelHandler<?,?> connection,
                            Throwable cause)
        Event handler for exceptions.
        参数:
        connection - Source connection.
        cause - Caught exception.
